name: picotm
title: picotm
tags: c, concurrency, development, distributedsystems, embedded, errorhandling, failsafe, framework, linux, lockless, manufacturing, multicore, multithreading, softwaretransactionalmemory, transactions

releases.changes: Added transactional snprintf(), sscanf(); Added restart statistics; Added module tests and `make check'.
Library versioning; Distinct file buffers; Internal error handling without abort(); strerror_r(); Shared ref-count object.
Transactional access to file-descriptor table; Adds R/W locks, R/W state, tree maps, ref counters to module library; C11 code.
Module library for tables and arrays; Fixes bug in tranasctional close(); MIT license.
Improved documentation; Detailed error reporting; Cleanups.
Initial release with STM, transactional C Standard Library, I/O, error handling; MPL v2.
